q1.question: Is my data safe with 1Fillr?
q1.answer: Absolutely. Your data is stored locally on your device and never transmitted to our servers. We use industry-standard encryption for any sensitive information. You have full control over your data and can delete it at any time.

q2.question: Which job sites does 1Fillr support?
q2.answer: 1Fillr works with all major Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) including Greenhouse, Lever, Workday, Ashby, BambooHR, iCIMS, and hundreds more. It also works on custom job application forms.

q3.question: How does the learning work?
q3.answer: When you fill out a job application form, 1Fillr observes which answers you provide for different types of questions. It learns the semantic relationship between questions and answers, so it can recognise similar questions on other sites even if they're worded differently.

q4.question: What if 1Fillr fills something incorrectly?
q4.answer: Every filled field shows a visual badge. You can hover over any field to see what was filled and click to undo. 1Fillr also won't auto-fill sensitive fields (like salary expectations) without your explicit confirmation.

q5.question: Do I need to create an account?
q5.answer: No account is required to use the free tier. Your data stays entirely on your device. An account is only needed if you want cloud sync or purchase additional credits.

q6.question: Can I get a refund?
q6.answer: Yes. We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all purchases. If you're not satisfied, contact us and we'll process your refund promptly.

s1.title: Download the extension file
s1.description: Click the button above to download the 1Fillr extension ZIP file.

s2.title: Extract the ZIP file
s2.description: Extract the downloaded ZIP file to a folder you can easily find, such as Desktop or Documents.

s3.title: Open Chrome extensions page
s3.description: Type chrome://extensions in your Chrome address bar and press Enter, or go to Menu → More Tools → Extensions.

s4.title: Enable Developer Mode
s4.description: Toggle on 'Developer mode' in the top right corner of the extensions page.

s5.title: Load the unpacked extension
s5.description: Click 'Load unpacked' button and select the folder you extracted (the one containing manifest.json).

s6.title: Start using
s6.description: The 1Fillr icon will appear in your browser toolbar. Visit any job site and click the icon to start auto-filling!
